name: Innocent Passage
description:
HOW TO PLAY

  • Left click on the sea to start a maritime crisis
  • Use 1, 2, 3, 4 to change the simulation speed (the game may lag at higher speeds)
  • Press M to mute/unmute
  • Press S to download a hi-res screenshot
  • Press Q to spawn a random crisis
  • Press R to reset the game

Orange = container ports. Red = US naval bases. Grey = other naval bases.

A downloadable version of the game is available here.

CREDITS

  • "World Map Static" by limyankaidarryl
